meanings.definition: A device used to detect radio waves by changing its electrical resistance.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a coherer to pick up radio signals.
meanings.sent2: The coherer helped in detecting the presence of radio waves.
meanings.sent3: The coherer decided to play hide and seek with the radio waves.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a coherer, resonating with the invisible waves of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The coherer hummed with energy as it captured the radio waves.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that coheres or sticks together.
meanings.sent1: The team was a coherer, working together seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The glue acted as a coherer, holding the pieces together.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic was a coherer, bringing everyone closer.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was a coherer, binding them through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: Laughter served as a coherer, uniting them in joy.
